welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Aransas Pass, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aransas County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Aransas County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Corpus Christi International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Corpus Christi International Airport primarily serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
